test_jobs.name: Simple CPU Test
test_jobs.description: Basic CPU-only test job that processes data
command: import os, json, time; result = {'status': 'completed', 'job_id': os.getenv('JOB_ID', 'test'), 'computation_time': 5.0, 'processed_items': 100, 'timestamp': time.time()}; print(json.dumps(result)); open(os.path.join(os.getenv('OUTPUT_DIR', '/tmp/node3_output'), 'result.json'), 'w').write(json.dumps(result))

test_jobs.name: Math Computation Test
command: import os, json, time; pi = 0.0; iterations = 5000000; start = time.time(); [pi := pi + (-1)**i / (2*i + 1) for i in range(iterations)]; pi *= 4; elapsed = time.time() - start; result = {'computation': 'pi_approximation', 'method': 'leibniz_formula', 'iterations': iterations, 'result': pi, 'elapsed_time': elapsed, 'status': 'completed'}; print(json.dumps(result)); open(os.path.join(os.getenv('OUTPUT_DIR', '/tmp/node3_output'), 'math_result.json'), 'w').write(json.dumps(result))

test_jobs.name: File Processing Test
test_jobs.description: Processes input files and generates output
command: import os, json; input_dir = os.getenv('INPUT_DIR', '/tmp/node3_input'); output_dir = os.getenv('OUTPUT_DIR', '/tmp/node3_output'); files_processed = []; import pathlib; input_path = pathlib.Path(input_dir); output_path = pathlib.Path(output_dir); output_path.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True); files = list(input_path.glob('*')) if input_path.exists() else []; total = len([f for f in files if f.is_file()]); [files_processed.append({'filename': f.name, 'lines': len(f.read_text().split('\n')), 'words': len(f.read_text().split()), 'characters': len(f.read_text()), 'processed': True}) if f.is_file() else None for f in files[:5]]; result = {'files_processed': files_processed, 'total_files': total, 'status': 'completed'}; print(json.dumps(result)); open(os.path.join(output_dir, 'processing_results.json'), 'w').write(json.dumps(result))

test_jobs.name: Python Script Test
test_jobs.description: Simple Python script execution (no GPU required)
command: import json, time, os; result = {'status': 'completed', 'job_id': os.getenv('JOB_ID', 'test'), 'timestamp': time.time()}; print(json.dumps(result)); open('/output/result.json', 'w').write(json.dumps(result))

build_instructions.simple: cd test_jobs && docker build -f Dockerfile.test-simple -t node3-test-simple:latest .
build_instructions.math: cd test_jobs && docker build -f Dockerfile.test-math -t node3-test-math:latest .
build_instructions.file_process: cd test_jobs && docker build -f Dockerfile.test-file-process -t node3-test-file-process:latest .
